duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish internal processes to support the effective observation of Service Center tasks to mitigate regulatory risks.
Draft proposed procedural enhancements based on Oversight observations to support customer experience and Team Member success.
Collaborate interdepartmentally and with peers for frequent information exchange and teamwork.
Gather and present performance remediation proposals to solve identified trend behaviors or opportunities to improve the customer experience.
Maintain confidentiality of key business messages and other sensitive work-specific information.
Provide insightful feedback to help Service Center Leaders and Oversight Specialists.
Stay abreast of procedure updates and changes to assess the accuracy of reviewed work effectively.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Compliance, Quality Assurance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
